answers.author: Louise Stevens
answers.text:
Frank, I'd be happy to help point you toward great examples, good models. Let me know how to best connect with you/get info. headed your way.  Options include inventories, needs assessments, cultural mapping and plans.

answers.author: Matthew Reges
answers.text:
Charlottesville is undertaking a cultural survey and planning process now. The local arts council has the lead, with limited City support. The consultant in charge has worked on 36 similar culture projects over 20 years, nationwide. A few of those studies are online. Just let me know if I can explain anything else on it.
This is our planning process web page: http://charlottesvillearts.org/createcville/
Pinellas County, FL: http://www.pinellascounty.org/pdf/cultural_plan.pdf
Tallahassee, FL: https://www.talgov.com/ecd/ecd-economic-culturalplan.aspx

author: Frank Lancaster
text: We are embarking on a Cultural Arts Inventory for our community and are hoping someone else has done a Cultural Arts Inventory or survey in their community that you are willing to share.
title: Cultural Arts Inventory
